From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 Indian Hindi-language film


Operation FrydayDirected byVishram SawantScreenplay byVishram SawantProduced bySwaty SatyamVenkatrao l SatyamStarringRandeep HoodaSuniel ShettyNeetu ChandraCinematographySamala BhaskerEdited byNipun GuptaMusic byAmar MohileVikaas VishwakarmaProductioncompanyTutri VenturesDistributed byZEE5 NetworkRelease date
26 January 2023 (2023-01-26)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Operation Fryday is Indian Hindi-language film, written and directed by Vishram Sawant. The film stars Randeep Hooda, Suniel Shetty and Neetu Chandra in lead roles. The film was released on 26 January 2023 by ZEE5 on its official OTT platform. [1]


Plot[edit]
A Muslim played by Randeep Hooda unwittingly gets involved in a terrorist bombing in Mumbai and decides to avenge the act.[2]

Cast[edit]
Randeep Hooda
Suniel Shetty
Neetu Chandra
Kiran Rathod
Rukhsar Rehman
Michelle Krusiec
Zakir Hussain
Siddharth Jadhav
Mrunal Jain
Filming[edit]
The film is mostly shot in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.[3]
